verses.text: \w Now|strong="H3588"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*’ \w father-in-law|strong="H2859"\w* \w Jethro|strong="H3503"\w*,\f + \fr 18:1 \ft Moses’ father-in-law Jethro was also called Reuel; see Exodus 2:18.\f* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*, \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w about|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w how|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

After \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* \w sent|strong="H3947"\w* \w back|strong="H3947"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* wife \w Zipporah|strong="H6855"\w*, \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w father-in-law|strong="H2859"\w* \w Jethro|strong="H3503"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* \w received|strong="H3947"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w*,

\w along|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H8147"\w* \w her|strong="H1961"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*. \w One|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w named|strong="H8034"\w* \w Gershom|strong="H1647"\w*,\f + \fr 18:3 \ft Gershom sounds like the Hebrew for sojourner.\f* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w Moses|strong="H8034"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* said, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w foreigner|strong="H5237"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w foreign|strong="H5237"\w* land.”

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* other son \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w named|strong="H8034"\w* Eliezer,\f + \fr 18:4 \ft Eliezer means God is my helper.\f* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w Moses|strong="H8034"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* said, “\w The|strong="H3588"\w* God \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* father \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* \w helper|strong="H5828"\w* \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H5337"\w* \w from|strong="H5337"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*.”

\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*’ \w father-in-law|strong="H2859"\w* \w Jethro|strong="H3503"\w*, along \w with|strong="H2859"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*’ wife \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w came|strong="H4872"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w* \w in|strong="H2583"\w* \w the|strong="H4872"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*, \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w encamped|strong="H2583"\w* \w at|strong="H2583"\w* \w the|strong="H4872"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* God.

\w He|strong="H8147"\w* sent word \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “\w I|strong="H1121"\w*, \w your|strong="H5973"\w* \w father-in-law|strong="H2859"\w* \w Jethro|strong="H3503"\w*, \w am|strong="H3503"\w* coming \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w your|strong="H5973"\w* wife \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H8147"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3318"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w his|strong="H3318"\w* \w father-in-law|strong="H2859"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w kissed|strong="H5401"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w*. \w They|strong="H7965"\w* \w greeted|strong="H7592"\w* each \w other|strong="H7453"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w into|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* tent.

\w Then|strong="H6213"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w recounted|strong="H5608"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w father-in-law|strong="H2859"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*’s \w sake|strong="H5921"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hardships \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w encountered|strong="H4672"\w* \w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w how|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w Jethro|strong="H3503"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="H2302"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, whom \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w rescued|strong="H5337"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w Jethro|strong="H3503"\w* declared, “\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* \w you|strong="H1288"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w greater|strong="H1419"\w* \w than|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* gods, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H1697"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* treated Israel \w with|strong="H3068"\w* arrogance.”

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*’ \w father-in-law|strong="H2859"\w* \w Jethro|strong="H3503"\w* \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* God, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron \w came|strong="H3478"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*’ \w father-in-law|strong="H2859"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* God. Jethro Advises Moses (Deuteronomy 1:9–18)

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w next|strong="H4283"\w* \w day|strong="H4283"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w took|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w seat|strong="H3427"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w around|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*.

\w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w father-in-law|strong="H2859"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*? \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w alone|strong="H4480"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w judge|strong="H6213"\w*, \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w standing|strong="H5324"\w* \w around|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*?”

“\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w come|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w me|strong="H1875"\w* \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w inquire|strong="H1875"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* God,” \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* replied.

“\w Whenever|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dispute|strong="H1697"\w*, \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w brought|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w between|strong="H8199"\w* \w one|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H3045"\w* \w and|strong="H2706"\w* \w another|strong="H7453"\w*, \w and|strong="H2706"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w make|strong="H3045"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* \w and|strong="H2706"\w* \w laws|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* God.”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*’ \w father-in-law|strong="H2859"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*, “\w What|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.

\w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w wear|strong="H5034"\w* yourselves \w out|strong="H4480"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w task|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w too|strong="H4480"\w* \w heavy|strong="H3515"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*. \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* handle \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w alone|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w*; \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H3289"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w some|strong="H1697"\w* \w advice|strong="H1697"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* God \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w*. \w You|strong="H5973"\w* must \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*’s \w representative|strong="H5971"\w* \w before|strong="H5973"\w* God \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w bring|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w causes|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Him|strong="H5973"\w*.

\w Teach|strong="H3045"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w laws|strong="H8451"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w show|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w live|strong="H8451"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w they|strong="H6213"\w* must \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.

Furthermore, \w select|strong="H2372"\w* \w capable|strong="H2428"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*—God-fearing, trustworthy \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* averse \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w dishonest|strong="H1215"\w* \w gain|strong="H1215"\w*. \w Appoint|strong="H7760"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w as|strong="H5971"\w* \w leaders|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* thousands, \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w*, \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w fifties|strong="H2572"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w tens|strong="H6235"\w*.

\w Have|strong="H1961"\w* \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \w men|strong="H1419"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w times|strong="H6256"\w*. \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* can \w bring|strong="H5375"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w major|strong="H1419"\w* issue, \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w minor|strong="H6996"\w* \w cases|strong="H1697"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* can \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w*, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w load|strong="H5375"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* lightened \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* share \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*.

If \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w follow|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w advice|strong="H1697"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* God \w so|strong="H6213"\w* directs \w you|strong="H6680"\w*, \w then|strong="H2088"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w able|strong="H3201"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w endure|strong="H5975"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w can|strong="H3201"\w* \w go|strong="H5971"\w* \w home|strong="H4725"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.”

\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w listened|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w father-in-law|strong="H2859"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w*.

\w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* chose \w capable|strong="H2428"\w* \w men|strong="H7218"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w as|strong="H5971"\w* \w leaders|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* thousands, \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w*, \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w fifties|strong="H2572"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w tens|strong="H6235"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w at|strong="H5971"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w times|strong="H6256"\w*; \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w would|strong="H5971"\w* bring \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w difficult|strong="H7186"\w* \w cases|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H6256"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w but|strong="H1992"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w minor|strong="H6996"\w* issue \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w would|strong="H5971"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w father-in-law|strong="H2859"\w* \w on|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w way|strong="H3212"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Jethro returned \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* own land.
